alliteration
===============================

version number: 0.0.1
author: Pragy Agarwal

Overview
--------

AI to boost your alliteration skills!

Installation / Usage
--------------------

To install use pip:

    $ pip install alliteration


Or clone the repo:

    $ git clone https://github.com/AgarwalPragy/alliteration.git
    $ python setup.py install
